page.title: 20HIGHFIELD C.C.
page.content: Highfield cricket field was donated to St.Mathew's Church in 1874 by the Blundell family who owned surrounding mines.At first the field was used for tennis and cricket.Tennis was played at the far end of the field.Now only cricket is played.Over the years there have been changes.The existing pavilion,which was built by members of the cricket club,has recently been modernized.Highfield C.C. has 5 teams: the First XI;the Second XI;the Wednesday Team and two junior teams (one under 15's;one under 13's.) Recently an extension and bar have been built.
